Title: Lace Evening Gown with Sequin Detail

----

Sizes: 10, 4, 8, 12, 14, 16, 6, 18

Colors: gold, off-white, navy, gray, black

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: C1882-navy-lace-evening-gown-with-sequin-detail_p.jpg

----

Description: A floor length lace gown with satin corded applique covering the gown. The bateau neckline and shoulders are trimmed with satin as well. The V shaped back accents the satin sash tied into a bow at the waistline.
